messages.content: I don't know why you even talk to human trash like this. Instead you should motivate him to leave her - at least that would be productive.
Can't decide if that's because we're playing gritty basketball late or getting kinda lucky and an inevitable regression to the mean
Generally you are still a “teacher” but I’m not sure 100%. I know my instructional coach role is still “teacher” contract/pay.
I don’t understand how her parents were able to take kid when she claims they are horrible alcoholics
Are you saying the ones who suffer most are billionaire psychopaths? I’m confused by the wording.
If everyone else can figure this out, then I don't see why it's so implausible for the US.
We finally lost a game while I was shuffling my tarot deck and now I can’t decide if I should try again or if the luck ran out
I'm not sure losing billions in trade is in anyone's interest other that political zealots.
Im not 😀 Glad you realize your mistake and why I was confused 😉
I'm confused. Where did I propose anything? I'm just describing how things currently work and what to consider...
Honestly? I dont know. My parents told me that itd be seen as suspicious
I don't understand how her hair is 'too light' or how that effects the concealer.
I never think someone is sincere when they say why “would I care if I’m being lied to” constantly?
What's that like? Like what's the thought process? I dunno. I know what's a weird question..i just can't imagine
Maybe so , i just dont know about him, team has enough turmoil they just dont need any more distractions
Some aren't. Either way it's a mystery how they obrained so many M1s.
Same here. I just don't understand how NOBODY at Lucasfilm said during the production, "Hey maybe this is a bad idea."
What? I didn’t understand a thing of what you said.
I doubt people are *happy*, but they probably aren’t sad about someone who was potentially endangering others through their anti-science views.
I can't tell if this is a happy or sad ending. 😐
I know. I didn't say I agreed with it did I?
Idk why you got downvoted but heres an upvote
Of course I remember a time when I didn't know what calories were. I was a child.
Idk if I’m wrong but I think they gave her some piercings on her ear which are cool too
I guess there's this, but that's all I can think of.
I never understood the point of parole. Seems to me like an expensive way to increase recidivism.
Yeah super confused about that considering it was only [NAME] she had beef with lol
What’s populism? I’ve seen it a lot lately and it seems to have, as far as I can tell...no meaning.
